content: to see your versions about hooked on aard aard is my brainchild it represents who i am and what i believe in as an afrikaans south african aard closely resembles aarde which is the afrikaans word for earth i have a passion for all things nature and through crochet i aim to minimise my impact on the environment slow fashion and minimalism have always two values i hold dearly aard is also a play on my initials which is adelina rita de abreu so aard really does encompass my entire being i hope you enjoy being a part of the crochet community as much as i do
